title: Hail Sting
description: What do you get when you cross a drone mosquito with Polonium-210?  Answer: One deadly little prick. Hail and his crew take minuturatoin to its limit when Hail attempts to kill the terrorist who killed his family.  Bad news, the terrorist is being held in a CIA underground detention facility.  Good news, Marshall Hail has a talent for making the impossible, possible.  Will his quest to kill the terrorist have repercussions for Kara and Hail's relationship? Damn straight! And the ripple effect of his actions could cost him everything he holds dear.
author: Brett Arquette
